title: Unspecified error please check logs for more information
body:
Having an issue when trying to launch the LOL client. The client begins by calculating differences and reaches 33% with  2421 files scanned before throwing the "unspecified error please check logs for more information" error. Was playing league yesterday perfectly fine so I am not sure what has changed since.

edit: I have deleted the lol_air_client as per riot reddit post regarding this issue and have had no luck.

replies.body:
Hey,

Check out any of the steps in the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support page.  Let me know how you go.

Specifically I'd suggest forcing a re-patch (was that the process you mention you already tried?) and/or repairing the client files.

Cheers
Mindstar
